website_summaries.verdict: Sony's slimmest Cyber-shot, the DSC-TX66, is a fun and powerful snapshot camera that might be too small and have too many megapixels for its own good.
pros: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX66 captures very good snapshots and video, is fast to focus and shoot, and has plenty of fun shooting options for those looking to do more than just take pictures
cons: The TX66's 18-megapixel resolution results in large file sizes, but doesn't make the photos any more usable for enlarging and cropping
Plus, its size and controls will be too small for some users

customer_reviews.title: I loved it till it died...long time Sony fan
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried this camera I was very impressed...lightweight, super features and output was like you would expect from something much larger. It was perfect as a small travel companion that would be relied upon for high quality stills or video...even the sound was very good. Bottom line: Two months ago the display died and it is now out of warranty and useless. I have been a Sony fan for over 25 years however my last two purchases have been great products with quality problems. Sadly this may have been my last Sony purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Sony digital cameras. I had one previously before this one and the only reason I had to get a new one is because the other one took many beatings from my drunk self trying to take photos and dropping it a million times lol It was definitely durable! This camera is the same model, just the newer version and I love it. The photos look great, have a nice quality and I love the full size touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle smith

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this camera
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this camera. First and foremost, it is light weight which makes it good for travelling. I really enjoy using the touchscreen feature which is an interesting aspect of it. I know when most people go out looking for electronic products, one of the first questions that come to mind is how is the battery life span. Well it lasts several hours however not for a whole day even if you charged it the whole night. So for example if I charge it for the whole night and I walk around the city for a few hours snapping only a few photos the battery will start dying quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSCTX66
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a camera that is very small, versatile, and up to date techonlogically. This seems to fit the bill...at least so far. Started my experience on a recent family trip to Disneyworld. The camera offers a multitude of settings and has a great zoom feature. Using the easy mode was fast and simple and resulted in great shots, at the instant needed. there is no significant time delay between pressing the shutter and taking the photo. Was able to zoom in and still freeze the action needed.
customer_reviews.author: Murrayk

customer_reviews.title: Now I know why it was discontinued
customer_reviews.text: I'm a loyal Sony and Cybershot customer. My last Cybershot camera, at least 2-3 years old, the touch screen does not work so I can not change settings. So I ordered this one. Only had for few months. Its hard to press the camera shoot button. Everyone presses the zoom or ON/OFF button instead. So not easy to hold and press. ALSO, the view screen went black! I had to send for repair. Very disappointed. But I knew it was discontinued. Not worth the $200 I paid. Would rather get another Cybershot with Wifi!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a gorgeous purple!
customer_reviews.text: this camera takes pictures beyond my expectation,it's very easy to use and very compact (fits in my mini purse to go around town). excellent pictures at night and really fun picture effects built in. battery life lasted longer than i thought. the panarama feature is great, once you get the hang of it. the only issue i had was of my own fault, i fell and the screen did crack. so other than not being used to touch screen technology on my camera, i highly reccommend! oh and i would also suggest getting high quality or the actual sony microsd card, it may have errors reading pictures off a cheap one..
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee D. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Great camera & Great features
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Sony Cyber-shot. Each time I purchase one, it gets better. The only thing is that I wish it came with more accessory options. I have a hard time finding a case that fits (not too big/not too small)
customer_reviews.author: Nowie

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera very much. Positives include small size, smaller than a cell phone. Picture quality is excellent. Almost every type of photography can be taken. Negative is only one, the menus that come up are less than obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Giese

customer_reviews.title: What I want it.
customer_reviews.text: Something compact as a mobile phone which can take good pictures and has fun features. It uses a Carl Zeis lens which is great but very little, so dont expect amazing photos. They are good, not excellent. The ISO of the Camera works great, also in low light. Im impressed with how fast is the AF and its recording quality.
customer_reviews.author: Oscarida

customer_reviews.title: Broken item
customer_reviews.text: This item broke last week Aug 20 on its first charging...
customer_reviews.author: graciano j. espiritu

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures ...
customer_reviews.text: But, it sometimes does not turn on. The green light stays on, but nothing happens. I have to remove batteries and replace them, restarting the camera. Then it works fine ... superb quality and portability.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Sony Camera
customer_reviews.text: The product is Great! It's relatively cheap, compared to the market, and it has all of top features. Add a Square Trade protection plan to it and theres no reason not to get it.
customer_reviews.author: zach burgess

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera. pictures is good. after i brought this price when down lot. so browse more before buy it. good luck

customer_reviews.title: Great purse camera
customer_reviews.text: I recommend to any buyer looking for a very portable and fast to use camera. No I eternal memory, must buy card

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for everyday picture taking
customer_reviews.text: Works great we use it for many different picture taking from normal stand stills to action shot bunnies. We love it

customer_reviews.title: good but there is no memory card in it
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera and it is really beautiful. the only thing I disappointed is that there is no memory card with it so that I have to buy it.

customer_reviews.title: super cute!
customer_reviews.text: i'd like to use it to record my daily life and travel with it. It is so small that i can take it with me wherever i am! Nice picture taken! love it

customer_reviews.title: Handy,.excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera because it is tiny, but yet takes quality pictures. I used to have TX55, and also TX9 , all these cameras are excellent..

customer_reviews.title: Great Sony Cybershot DSC-TX66 Camera.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is awesome. Takes fabulous pictures and videos. Small enough to fit in the pocket. It is easy to work with. I would highly recommended this camera. I have owned quite a few Sony Cameras, however, this is by far one of the nicest.

customer_reviews.text: Love this little camera.......perfect to take anywhere and everywhere. I had an older model, but LOVE this one. Sony is the best.

customer_reviews.text: The convenience if its inherent portability, belie the power and prowess of this compact camera. The recipient loves the camera.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. HD video quality with nice still shots that almost rivals my SLR. (but not quite). The only complaint is the super sensitive touch screen. I find myself activating it by accident all the time. Would also be nice if I could find screen protectors for the beautiful OLED screen!! Only 1 month and it's already scratched :(

customer_reviews.title: Sony cybershot. ..great buy
customer_reviews.text: I had before sony tx9....lookingnfor next one. This is one of the bast camera i have found..better than tx9..,thinnest...face detection and very low shutter time..must buy

customer_reviews.title: Goes anywhere Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing camera ... clear, gorgeous pictures, easy to use and easy to understand. Amazon saved the day by overnighting this to me when my Cybershot died just before a big occasion!

customer_reviews.text: "Chic" look, beautiful design and awesome pics! Easy to use touch digital camera that puts out great pictures. Love the slim sleek design.

customer_reviews.title: Has damage on the camera lens....
customer_reviews.text: Overall in ok condition, but the camera lens has a chip damage on the top right. Return it right after.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Outside material is very slippery and slips out of your hands very often.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Kansal

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with the camera. Its small and handy and has a lot of cool features, but overall I overpaid for it. The images are not very good quality and in fact my smartphone takes same or better quality shots. If you need a tiny camera, this will work but if youre looking for good quality shots, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vil

customer_reviews.title: Money lost
customer_reviews.text: The camera lens is damaged. I went to Sony of Venezuela but they do not recognize the guarantee claiming the product was purchased out of the country. Is there anyway to get a reimbursement?
customer_reviews.author: rosalbagual

customer_reviews.title: lens cover open--weird
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning it because the lens cover was open before I touched the camera, which is kind of weird. I figured usually a new one shouldn't be. Just suspicious. I purchased another one from a physical Sony store, the lens cover was closed before I took the camera out of the wrapping bag.
customer_reviews.author: a12

customer_reviews.title: Camera problems and terrible Sony Custoerm Service !
customer_reviews.text: Sony Cameras suffer from CMOS problems with colored vertical lines in many photos. DO NOT BUY A SONY camera- They sold me a Protection Plus Warranty for this camera then when problem occurred and was sent to repair station they wanted to bill me $161. They refused to honor the Warranty because I could no longer supply original sakes receipt even though they had sold a Extended Warranty for if showing the Serial Number. They offered to refund the Warranty cost of $25 rather than perform their contractual obligation to fix it. Poor design and worse Customer Service . Will NEVER purchase another Sony product
customer_reviews.author: A. Cable

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only a few days!
customer_reviews.text: This camera listed some impressive features. I have been loyal to the Sony brand (own two laptops and two other digital cameras). Well, those features lasted but a few days because the LCD screen completely died. After returning my BRAND NEW camera to SONY as it was under warranty, they called to say it had to be my fault and they would not fix the camera! The call representative wanted to sell me a new camera and an enhanced warranty! Stay away from this model. I am VERY disappointed in SONY. The brand, at one time, was a guarantee of quality; sadly, that is no longer true. They got my money and I got screwed out of hundreds of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dish Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: How the hell can people write like 5000 word reviews? I'm sure I could go in to depth about the features of this camera but hell, it works. It takes pictures. Good ones. 'Nuff said. I got it for $200. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Rock

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera, with 3d to boot
customer_reviews.text: Sony has done it again with it's optics and this great little camera. The camera takes perfect pictures and while the 3D might be a gimmick it is still a pretty cool feature. The panoramic does take a while to get used to, but other than that a great little camera!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Broke twice in first month.
customer_reviews.text: I had this camera for 3 weeks and the screen died. Sent it for repair and 3 days later the whole camera died. Sony repair facility is horrible to deal with and most customer service calls are answered in India now. I bought the extra warranty and they won't help until the camera is a year old. They won't replace and want me to send it to them again. Very disappointed in Sony.
customer_reviews.author: H. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a photo guru by any means. I picked this up because I have had good experience with the cybershot series in the past, and once again I am not disappointed. Pictures are great with more options than I need. Most importantly to me the camera is very responsive with little delay.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: great pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: this is a great camera for anybody who just needs something small and portable,takes great pictures you just need to adjust it to your liking it's not perfect out of the box but nothing is without adjustment

customer_reviews.title: Purchased in Jan 2013; screen went black in Dec ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Jan 2013; screen went black in Dec 2014. Worked very well while it lasted and the reason for 2 stars. Should have gotten another couple years at least for the price. Only one year warranty. Repair at Sony eSupport is $126 plus shipping. Time to move on to Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Voy2Peru

customer_reviews.title: Gifted
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera for my lady for Christmas, she loves it and so do I. Plenty of cool and fun functions on this thing and great pictures ad response times. I'd buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: SONY CYBER TX66
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It's small and so easy to use. Even my 4 year old son can take great pictures.

customer_reviews.title: Too hot?!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pics....but its been a hot summer...and even though ive had my camera in a case, it gets so hot then wont turn on! I bought it for my son's 2nd birthday party and it would not turn on that day. So I got no pictures to capture the day. But it turned on no problem later that night. Not cool for a $350 camera! I will be returning it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Castellese

customer_reviews.title: Best camera in its category
customer_reviews.text: Use it to believe. It really does the job, no experience requiered, just have fun and start saving those memories.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Alvarez Torres

product_meta.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX66 18.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 3.3-inch OLED (Pink) (2012 Model)
product_meta.description:
Color:PinkNever say "I wish I'd had my camera" again - with the thinnest Sony Cyber-shot(R) camera yet, you'll be prepared to nab the shot anywhere, at any time. Just slip this incredibly slim DSC-TX66 camera into your pocket or purse, then rest assured the next time something amazing happens, you'll be ready. As slender as a AA battery, this camera is small in size but huge in shooting potential with a whopping 18.2MP Exmor R CMOS sensor for incredible lowlight performance, Full HD 1080/60i video capture (records in 29-minute segments), plus 5x optical zoom and 10x Clear Image zoom. And with a big, beautiful 3.3" OLED touch screen, flipping through photos, navigating menus or exploring creative Picture Effects options is fun and easier than ever. 3D Still Image & 3D Sweep Panorama mode - Produce awe-inspiring images with 3D still image and 3D Sweep Panorama capabilities Background Defocus - The system takes two shots, identifies the background and applies a defocused background keeping the subject crisp and clear Capture the decisive moment with up to 10fps - Capture full 18.2 megapixel resolution images at up to 10 frames per secondSpecifications Sensor Size / Total Pixels / Filter - 1/2.3-inch Exmor R CMOS / 18.9 Total Megapixels / RGB Primary Color Filter Effective Pixels - 18.2 Megapixels Lens - Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar Optical Zoom - 5x Focal Length (35mm equivalent) - Still 16 - 9 - 28-140mm / Still 4 - 3 - 26-130mm / Movie 16 - 9 - 28-140mm & 4 - 3 - 35-175mm(SteadyShot Standard) Steady Shot Mode Active - Yes LCD - 3.3 Xtra Fine OLED Display with Touch Panel (1229K dots) Storage Media - Optional MS Micro/MS Micro (Mark 2) & microSD/SDHC media Still Image Size (JPEG) - Up to 16 - 9 13M(4896 2752) / 4 - 3 18M(4896x3672) Video Mode - Up to AVCHD 60i - 24M FX/ 17M FH(1,920 x 1,080/60i) / MP4 - 12M(1,440 x 1,080/30fps) / 3M VGA(640 x 480/30fps) ISO - Auto, 100 - 12800 Flash -

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

SONY CYBER-SHOT DSC-TX66 18.2 MP DIGITAL CAMERA WITH 5X OPTICAL ZOOM AND 3.3-INCH OLED 

 * 18.2 MP Exmor R CMOS sensor
   
 * Large 3.3-inch OLED
 * High speed AF improves focus speed
 * Full HD 1080/60i with dual record of stills and movies1
   
 * 5x Optical zoom plus 10x Clear Image zoom
   
 * Capture the decisive moment with up to 10fps
 * Optical Image stabilization with improved active mode4
 * 3D Still Image and 3D Sweep Panorama mode3
   
 * Picture Effect for more expressive photos
 * Photo Creativity allows easy photographic expression

































Experience the super-thin design and colorful 3.3-inch OLED touchscreen Sony DSC-TX66. Its 18.2MP sensor and 5X optical/10X Clear Image zoom lens capture sharp pictures and Full HD 1080/60i videos. High Speed AF improves focusing speed and accuracy, while Picture Effects and 3D Sweep Panorama modes expand creativity. 




KEY FEATURES
18.2 MEGAPIXEL BACK-ILLUMINATED EXMOR R CMOS IMAGE SENSOR
The 18.2MP Exmor R CMOS sensor captures ultra-high definition images that take full advantage of the camera’s sharp Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens. The sensor enables advanced processing that reduces noise levels up to 6 times more than other sensors, resulting in stunning low light images with incredible details.


SLIM AND STYLISH DESIGN

At just over 1.5-inches thin and only 3.3 oz, the DSC-TX66 is the perfect size to take with you almost anywhere. Slip it into a pocket, purse, or backpack and be ready to shoot memorable moments. The 3.3-inch (1,229K dots) OLED Xtra Fine touch screen with wide viewing angle delivers brilliant-quality still images and movies while enabling easy focusing operation.

HIGH SPEED AF
To improve focusing speed and sensitivity, the Exmor R CMOS sensor uses its rapid throughput to deliver high-quality image signals to the camera’s BIONZ processor, which provides intelligent response data to a new high speed actuator motor in the lens. The result is fast, DSLR-like focusing speeds even in low light.


FULL HD 1080/60I

Record crystal clear movies at the highest resolution available with capabilities for 60i in 1080 AVCHD video.1 This provides stunning, fast motion video with less distortion for playback on your HD TV.2 With dual record of stills and movies, you can shoot both at the same time.

CAPTURE THE DECISIVE MOMENT WITH UP TO 10FPS

Capture full 18.2 megapixel resolution images at up to 10 frames per second, helping to ensure that the decisive moment is captured such as the soccer ball flying into the goal. In addition, a mechanical shutter helps reduce distortion when continuously shooting moving subjects. 
OPTICAL STEADYSHOT WITH ACTIVE MODE

Optical SteadyShot with Active Mode for blur-free movies even while walking.4 Camera-shake compensation using Optical SteadyShot/Active Mode has been improved with the addition of new electronic image stabilization. Now it’s easier than ever to obtain sharp, blur-free movies even when zooming in unsteady situations, such as shooting with one hand while walking. 

3D STILL IMAGE AND 3D SWEEP PANORAMA MODE3

Produce awe-inspiring images with 3D still image and 3D Sweep Panorama capabilities.3 Photos will take on a new dimension of creative capabilities for viewing the world in a whole new way.

OPTICAL ZOOM PLUS CLEAR IMAGE ZOOM
Most digital zooms use electronic cropping to get closer to the subject, resulting in unsharp images. With Clear Image Zoom the powerful processor compares patterns found in adjacent pixels and creates new pixels to match selected patterns, resulting in more realistic, higher-quality images. Clear Image Zoom doubles optical zoom for closer photos. 
BACKGROUND DEFOCUS

DSLR photographs are often beautiful because they blur the background, putting the emphasis on the subject. Now the DSC-TX66 can deliver this signature DSLR benefit. The system takes two shots, identifies the background and applies a defocused background keeping the subject crisp and clear.

PICTURE EFFECT FOR MORE EXPRESSIVE PHOTOS 

Picture Effect adds a new level of expression to photos, making ordinary landscapes and portraits come to life by heightening mood and emphasizing certain attributes. Select camera models have up to nine different effects. 

PHOTO CREATIVITY
Photo Creativity allows you to fine-tune your exposure settings, such as brightness, color, and vividness, and quickly choose the right enhancement for your subject. Now you can view Picture Effects and Photo Creativity effects in real time on the camera’s monitor or in the viewfinder before shooting. 
SUPERIOR AUTO MODE

Get cleaner, more dynamic pictures and fewer missed shots. The DSC-TX66 automatically recognizes the correct scene mode, then quickly shoots and combines up to six shots to produce images with greater clarity, optimum dynamic range using Backlight Correction HDR technology and lower image noise using 6 shots layering technology. Superior Auto intelligently detects 36 scenes for still images and movies, making it easy to get the best shot. 

FACE DETECTION TECHNOLOGY 

Face Detection technology detects up to eight individual faces and adjusts focus, exposure, and white balance to help deliver crisp, properly lit images of family and friends.


SMILE SHUTTER TECHNOLOGY 


Smile Shutter technology captures a smile the moment it happens. Simply press the Smile Shutter button and the camera does the rest. You can also select adult and child priority andindicate the degree of Smile Detection sensitivity. Intelligent Scene Recognition can now be used together with Smile Shutter mode when the Intelligent Auto mode is on. This means that beautiful smiles can be captured with settings optimized for the particular scene, even in difficult conditions such as twilight and backlighting. 



ANTI-BLINK FUNCTION 

It’s frustrating to capture the perfect shot, only to review it later and discover subjects blinked during the photo. The Anti-blink function works to help counter blinking and squinting. When the camera is set to Soft Snap, the Anti-blink function captures two images, recording only the photo with less squinting. If a blink is detected in other shooting modes, a warning will be displayed after you take the shot.

SOFT SKIN MODE

Portrait subjects will love the results. Soft Skin mode recognizes skin tones and reduces the appearance of blemishes and wrinkles without affecting the rest of the shot.

INTELLIGENT SCENE RECOGNITION (ISCN) MODE

Intelligent Scene Recognition (iSCN) Mode automatically detects 36 different types of scenes and selects the appropriate camera settings. In Auto Mode, the camera takes a single shot using the optimal settings. In Advanced Mode, the camera takes a photo with the optimal settings and, if in difficult lighting (low light or back light) immediately takes a second photo with another optimized setting so you can choose which to keep.

NATURAL FLASH

Conventional point-and-shoot camera flash shots just don't capture colors the way the eye sees them. Natural Flash mode takes a reference shot without flash and then uses that reference to correct the color, for far more lifelike images.

MOTION DETECTION

Motion Detection, along with Face Motion Detection adjusts ISO sensitivity and increases the shutter speed when movement is detected, reducing blur in moving subjects and faces.


 * 
 * 

1. Records in 29 minute segments 
2. Requires HDTV and HDMI cable sold separately
3. Requires 3D HDTV, HDMI cable (at least 10.2 Gbps) and active 3D glasses sold separately.
4. Combined with electronic stabilization
feature_bullets: 18.2 megapixels "Exmor R" CMOS sensor for superior low-light performance
High speed AF improves focus speed
Photo Creativity allows easy photographic expression

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars73 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
